title: Google Stock Ownership - Who Owns Google in 2025? | WallStreetZen
snippet: Brin Sergey is the largest individual Google shareholder, owning 360.14M shares representing 2.98% of the company. Brin Sergey's Google shares are currently valued at $108.93B. If you're new to stock investing, here's how to buy Google stock. ©2025 WallStreetZen ·

title: Who Owns Google in 2025? Read about Alphabet Inc.!
snippet: Alphabet Inc.’s unique ownership structure balances founder control with public investment, enabling Google to remain a tech titan in 2025.

title: Who Owns Google?
snippet: Alphabet Inc. owns Google through a corporate structure established in October 2015. The restructuring separated Google’s core internet business from experimental ventures while maintaining founder control through a dual-class share system.
